client_description_Summary_Note:
Emma Evelyne Suter and the RM are cousins, having grown up together in Zürich. Their familial bond has naturally extended into a professional partnership built on mutual respect and shared values.
Emma Evelyne Suter is a 24 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Attracted by Julius Baer's reputation for excellence, she chose to join for the bespoke financial solutions offered.
client_description_Family_Background: Emma Evelyne Suter is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Emma obtained her secondary school diploma from Gymnasium Köniz Bern in 2019.
Emma finished her studies at University of Bern in 2023.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Emma Evelyne Suter is a 24 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Emma Evelyne Suter did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not manage to save any money during her career.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of her grandmother, a successful Oil and Gas Executive, she received an inheritance of 1200000 CHF in 2016, which she has used to secure her financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Emma achieve financial success and security as she embarks on her professional journey.
